titleStmt.title: An epistolary discourse on the great assistances to a Christians faith and for a more intire rest and assurance in the highest trials and adventures thereof : with a second part, upon the present times, and these rare vicissitudes of providence in the public state of Britain in this age : to which an appendix is added in the close / by R. Fleming ...
titleStmt.author: Fleming, Robert, 1660?-1716.
